[vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” el_class=”page-hero page-hero–secondary” el_id=”page-hero”][vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin=”true” visibility=”visible-phone” el_id=”page-hero__background-image–sm” css=”.vc_custom_1597888070305{background-image: url(https://moula.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/Career_header_mob.jpg?id=19718) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”page-hero__background-image”][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin=”true” wpex_bg_overlay=”color” visibility=”visible-tablet” el_id=”page-hero__background-image–md” el_class=”page-hero__background-image” css=”.vc_custom_1597888090932{background-image: url(https://moula.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/Career_header_1920.jpg?id=19719) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” wpex_bg_overlay_color=”#203543″][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin=”true” el_id=”page-hero__background-image–lg” el_class=”page-hero__background-image” css=”.vc_custom_1597888109489{background-image: url(https://moula.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/Career_header_1920.jpg?id=19719) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” visibility=”visible-desktop”][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin=”true”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6″ el_class=”col-sm-centered”]

We're hiring!
Come work with us.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section][vc_row][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-offset-1 vc_col-md-10″]

Work at Moula

[vc_column_text]As an equal opportunity employer, we welcome people with diverse life experiences, fresh ideas, and subject-matter expertise. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, colour, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, or age. From the moment you step through our doors, or meet us through a screen, you’ll feel welcome and supported to do the best work of your career.

We’re not looking for perfect, or someone who knows it all. We’re focused on hiring smart and curious people with an interest in making financial services more human and accessible. If you’re ready to make a difference, and be proud of your work, check out our open roles. You’ll be in good company.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin=”true”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-offset-1 vc_col-md-10″][vc_video link=”https://youtu.be/pTqzrPt0VkA”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1597897109590{padding-top: 4rem !important;padding-bottom: 4rem !important;background-color: #f5f6f6 !important;}”][vc_row content_placement=”middle” remove_bottom_col_margin=”true”][vc_column width=”7/12″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-offset-1 vc_col-md-7 vc_col-sm-offset-1 vc_col-xs-12″ el_class=”col-sm-centered”]

A good workplace starts with great people

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ offset=”vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-3 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-offset-3 vc_col-xs-6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1530754563705{padding-top: 4vh !important;padding-bottom: 4vh !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-offset-1 vc_col-md-10″][vc_raw_html]JTNDZGl2JTIwaWQlM0QlMjJncm5oc2VfYXBwJTIyJTNFJTNDJTJGZGl2JTNFJTBBJTNDc2NyaXB0JTIwc3JjJTNEJTIyaHR0cHMlM0ElMkYlMkZib2FyZHMuZ3JlZW5ob3VzZS5pbyUyRmVtYmVkJTJGam9iX2JvYXJkJTJGanMlM0Zmb3IlM0Rtb3VsYSUyMiUzRSUzQyUyRnNjcmlwdCUzRQ==[/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row]
